clueServer
Class Player

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      clueServer.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Player
extends Thread

Class semantics and roles:
Class that describes a player. maintains and manages server-side instance(s) of a connected player

Information maintenance:
Creation: ???
Deletion: ???

Author:
Erich Schudt (Class Skeletons), Erich Schudt (Code)

Player

public Player(String username,
              Socket sock,
              String piece,
              Users u)
Constructor that creates a player
Takes 4 arguments

Parameters:
username - the user name of the player
sock - the Socket with which this Player
piece - the name string of the assigned play-piece
u - a reference to the creator Users class will create a ClientSocket
